verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Holy Ghost, you're wonderful.
Holy Ghost, wind blowing strong,
Blowing from heaven.
(Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We have decided to go,
All the way with our God.
Revival in the land that's our goal.
As soldiers in His army,
we'll fight with heart and soul.

verse.name: b1a
verse.lines:
We call upon blood and fire.
A stream flowing strong,
Flowing from heaven.
